Title: Provision of an "off the shelf" Youth Offending case Management Solution
Description:
North Lincolnshire Council is inviting you to tender for the provision of an \r
'off the shelf' Youth Offending case management solution to support the council \r
in meeting Her Majesty's Inspectorate of Probation (HMIP) and Youth Justice \r
Board requirements for managing and supporting a local authority youth justice \r
service. \r
  The software application needs to have the current or future \r
capacity to integrate with our OLM Group Ltd CareFirst social care application \r
and Capita One case management suite to reduce duplication of data entry.

Title: TS16008 Supply and Support of an Internally Hosted, Web Based Client Caseload Information System and Youth Work Solution, with Associated Services
Description:
The Council requires a holistic Solution that provides both a Client Caseload Information System and Youth Work solution as part of a single Solution. The Solution will be internally hosted and web based.

Benchmarking indicates this requirement can be delivered below the OJEU threshold of £164,176. Therefore, any submissions that do not fall below this figure for the Total Contract Value including optional requirements and possible extensions will be deemed non-compliant.

The Solution shall provide information to support Young People to engage in education and training, identify those who are not participating and to plan services that meet Young People’s needs. The Solution must facilitate the provision of statutory information to the Department for Education through the National Client Caseload Information System (NCCIS). 

The document request deadline is 01/08/2016.
Additional Text:
The contract period will be 3 years from Go-Live, with the option to extend for 1 further year to take the contract term up to a maximum of 4 years.

Tenderers must apply via the e-tendering system.
